talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Elf Elder$
...(He looks tired)

$Elf Elder$
…I've been the Elder for so many years, but I never expected I would serve such a king.(Elf Elder looks tired)

${user_nick}$
It must be tough on you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I agree he's not like a normal king)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9458_qu_01.ogg}
…Though he is not a foolish tyrant, he doesn't use his wisdom. Instead of ruling with dignity, he get too emotional. He takes his past sins too lightly and gets too attached to people… I'm not sure if he has the qualities to be a king.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9458_qu_02.ogg}
…Sometimes I lose myself too. But no matter how hard I try, he still reminds me of his past. I don't know what he wants. I don't understand why this world would give him such a Telesia to become the king. (The Elder looks perplexed)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The Elder couldn't get over the past too…)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9458_qu_03.ogg}
I didn't have to think about how a queen should act when Narcilia was on the throne. I finally see how fitting she was as a queen with all her grace and dignity.(Elf Elder smiles bitterly)

$Elf Elder$
For your future plans... you have three options to choose from.

${user_nick}$
Only three?

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9458_qu_04.ogg}
The first option would be to run away like what they told you just now. It will set you free, but the Royal Castle may send soldiers to hunt you down.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9458_qu_05.ogg}
Second, take on a new role without informing the humans.
That will be based on the elf's decree, and it will give you a reason why you didn't return. You don't have to go into hiding too.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9458_qu_06.ogg}
The third choice would be... to return to Saint Haven and let them know the truth about what happened.
I'm not sure what they will do to you if you do that.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9458_qu_07.ogg}
...I can't make this choice for you. But remember, the elves will always be on your side, no matter what you choose.

${user_nick}$
Thank you.

${user_nick}$
(It's hard to make a choice... The first option will make me a fugitive. The second option sounds good, but it will hurt the elves' relationship with the human kingdom.)

${user_nick}$
(The third option is the most honest one, but both Velskud and Yuvenciel recommend against it.)

${user_nick}$
(What should I do?)

$Elf King Federeth$
You would definitely have to consider what your actions would do to you.
(He frowns at the Elf Elder. Go outside and talk to Elf Elder.)

$Elf Elder$
Shall we go for a walk?
(Talk to the Elf Elder outside the Tree of Life.)

$Elf Elder$
(Elf Elder smiles as if he's trying to reassure you) I know this will be a difficult decision for you to make. Why don't you go and take a breather? You could go and talk to Citridel too.

$Elf Guard Citridel${sound:npc_Sitredel_9458_qu_01.ogg}
{user_nick}!! I'm so relieved that you are back safe and sound! I prayed to the Goddess and the Tree of Life every day for your safe return…

$Elf Guard Citridel${sound:npc_Sitredel_9458_qu_02.ogg}
Hehehe… (Citridel grins at you.)

$Elf Guard Citridel${sound:npc_Sitredel_9458_qu_03.ogg}
I fought hard too. The Dragon Followers are nuts! While you were gone, they tried to steal this artifact, but we managed to get it back!
(She shows you a small, stone slab.)

${user_nick}$
This looks like it belonged to the Ancients...

$Elf Guard Citridel$
It is! Wow you are really observant. It has a prophecy written on it or something, but it's written in a weird language, not even the one used by the Ancients. I wonder how this can be used... Maybe you might know.
(She hands you the slab.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(You're getting a headache so rest for a while)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
Hmm…(As you read the words on the slate, your pocket starts to glow… It's the Ancient stone that was used for stopping Lunaria!)


*A cut scene will be played if you continue. You cannot proceed if there is a party member at the previous stage for the same quest.

${user_nick}$
?!?!(The slate is glowing too, and the words on it are rearranged. Your pocket suddenly feels empty… the Ancient stone is gone!)

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Are you okay?!
Don't push yourself! Usually foreign languages can give headaches!

(Talk to Citridel again to continue with the quest)

$Elf Elder$
Talking to Citridel will help you clear your mind.
(Talk to Citridel.)

${user_nick}$
(I can read this!)

$Elf Guard Citridel${sound:npc_Sitredel_9458_qu_04.ogg}
{user_nick}? Hellooo!

${user_nick}$
Huh?

$Elf Guard Citridel${sound:npc_Sitredel_9458_qu_05.ogg}
Are you okay? You were suddenly staring at the slate blankly… Oh could it be… did you read it?!
(Citridel's eyes are sparkling)

${user_nick}$
Eh… erm… no. I think I read something, but I’m not sure...
(Huh? I think I read something but I don't remember what it was)

$Elf Guard Citridel$
I see… Maybe we should take this to Lianna. She's the best expert on ancient languages.

${user_nick}$
Really?

$Elf Guard Citridel${sound:npc_Sitredel_9458_qu_06.ogg}
Yes! You haven't heard about her language abilities? She can read seven types of the Ancient's languages… though I haven't seen her do that with my own eyes...

${user_nick}$
Wait, the Ancients had seven languages?

$Elf Guard Citridel${sound:npc_Sitredel_9458_qu_07.ogg}
The Ancients had about 10 languages, but no one in this world can read all of them. Isn't it weird that they had so many languages?

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Oh right, I also read it somewhere that the Ancients knew the language of Gods. Is that why they had so many languages?

${user_nick}$
God's language??

$Elf Guard Citridel$
There were many Prophets among the Ancients, so some of them wrote down what they saw in their dreams… Well, this is just Meriendel's theories.

${user_nick}$
Huh???? Did you just say Meriendel?!?

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Hmm? {user_nick}, do you know Elf Meriendel?(Citridel looks suprised)

${user_nick}$
Well of course! She… always walks around with her eyes closed… dressed in blue… she's the strongest elf around!

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Wow that's right! Are you her fan too? She's a legendary researcher on the Ancients. I used to read her books for hours. That was the best time of my life...
(Citridel's eyes look dreamy)

$Elf Guard Citridel$
I loved the [Goddess's Land] chapter 3! - The Land of the Goddess, The Land of Her Dream… It was so amazing… It makes me feel like going back in time to see it with my own eyes.(Citridel excitedly shares what she read)

${user_nick}$
(Time travel isn't as fun as you think, Citridel...)

$Elf Guard Citridel$
When I was young, I would stay up all night to… Kyargh! Arrhelpp! My stomach…!!
(Citridel grasps her stomach with a weird shriek)

${user_nick}$
Citridel! Do you still have the gastric pain?

$Elf Guard Citridel$
(Coughs) I'm much better now. I must have gotten myself too excited, hehe.
I should focus on recovering my health. Then when peace returns, I'll become an adventurer and travel around the world too!

$Elf Elder$
Citridel, can I talk to you for a minute?

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Looks like I have work to do.
Catch you later, {user_nick} Rest well and good luck for your next assignment!

${user_nick}$
(Citridel is always so busy...)

${user_nick}$
(But… I haven't made up my mind yet. Maybe I should talk to Geraint.)

$Geraint$
What took you so long! Stupid {user_nick}!

${user_nick}$
(Tell him what happened)

$Geraint$
What? Why are you so indecisive? You can just follow your mission. Or don't you even have one?
(Geraint looks slightly irritated)

${user_nick}$
Not really...

$Geraint$
Or are you scared of them? You're such a weakling. But don't act like you're weak in front of other people. It makes me sick.

${user_nick}$
(Why am I getting scolded by this young kid...)

$Geraint$
Hmph, if you're so worried, I'll go and get rid of them for you. Did you say it's Saint Haven? I think I can get the job done with a few swings.
(He swings his sword wildly to demonstrate)

$Geraint$
Whatever! Protecting the humans was Argenta's role, not mine! I'm just going to wipe out any enemies I see. But humans are like snails. They keep on appearing even after being wiped out.

${user_nick}$
(You have a throbbing headache.)
Erm… Thank you for your concern, but I'll just go ahead and handle this my way.

$Geraint$
Anyway, be quick! I'll leave if you make me wait for too long.
(He shouts irritatedly and concentrates on his sword again)

${user_nick}$
(I realize now that I shouldn't leave Geraint alone. But that doesn't help with making my decision… Maybe I should try going to...)

(Go to the place where Iona was)

${user_nick}$
(It feels as if this place still feels like soft snow like Iona)

${user_nick}$
(Iona…. It feels like yesterday that I met you here. So many things happened since then…
You gave me your power, and believed in me. But...)

${user_nick}$
Now I don't know if I'll ever be able to go to Hafling, like I promised. You gave me your blessing, but all I could do is wander around aimlessly in time... and now Argenta is… gone...

${user_nick}$
(Geraint praised me, Feder said I'm a fool, Meriendel told me not to forget anything. Gaharam said she wanted to see the fate created by those who were determined to save this world. But in the end we lost. What shold I do now…)

${user_nick}$
(Of course I want to protect this world. I never thought Feder was right. What he's doing is not right. No matter how fake this world is, how can he destroy it for a new world...)

${user_nick}$
(…But everything is so overwhelming and I can't really think clearly. How did I end up here. I never thought I would become involved in a fight that decides the fate of this world… What would Iona or Geraint do in my shoes?)

${user_nick}$
(…What would they say to me? Both of them are dragons and they don't know how to lie, so they would be brutally honest. They wouldn't lie about anything...?)

${user_nick}$
…Right...

${user_nick}$
(…I've made up my mind. I should let Elf Elder know.)

$Terrence Terramai$
Things have become so complicated...
(Talk to the Elf Elder.)

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9458_qu_08.ogg}
There you are. I was expecting you.

$Terrence Terramai${sound:npc_Terramai_9458_qu_01.ogg}
I just heard what happened from the Elder. Things have become tricky. No one expected the Monolith to be opened… And the Silver Dragon is dead. It is a miracle that we are still alive.

${user_nick}$
Terramai!

$Terrence Terramai${sound:npc_Terramai_9458_qu_02.ogg}
There is no need for you to be so suprised. I have always been keeping a close eye on this issue. I only brought my Temple Knights with me so you don't have to worry.

$Terrence Terramai${sound:npc_Terramai_9458_qu_03.ogg}
The elves are not the only ones who will stand by your side. I will support you no matter what decision you make.

$Terrence Terramai${sound:npc_Terramai_9458_qu_04.ogg}
If the adventurer who has risked his life to save the world is only held accountable for the failures, then it would show how we have failed to change for the better.
(Terrence Terramai sighs bitterly)

$Terrence Terramai$
Besides, this is not a complete failure. The Dragon Followers have been crushed, and you have confirmed that the Conqueror King really exists… Perhaps the fact that the Monolith has opened could be a little sacrifice for what was to be achieved. We should be happy that things are not as bad as we expected.

$Terrence Terramai${sound:npc_Terramai_9458_qu_06.ogg}
Don't be disheartened by the fact that you couldn't achieve a swift victory. Brush it off and live on. That's the privilege of young people! If I were ten years younger, I would have...
(Terramai punches the air as if he is reliving the old days)

$Elf Elder$
(He takes a step back from Terramai)
That's very... inspiring. Thank you. {user_nick}, have you come to a decision?

${user_nick}$
I've decided… (Tell them your decision)

$Terrence Terramai${sound:npc_Terramai_9458_qu_07.ogg}
I knew you'd make the same choice as those of 50 years ago. Leave it to me on reporting to the Royal Castle.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9458_qu_09.ogg}
Just as Terramai said. If you need me, I will come with you.

$Terrence Terramai$
I will… try to take care of the situation in the Royal Castle. You should take a rest here. The clear air of Anu Arendel will speed up your recovery.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9458_qu_10.ogg}
I'm sorry that's all I can do for you even though you have worked so hard for us. But please tell me if you ever need anything.
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9458_qu_11.ogg}
Pala Telesia….
May the Goddess bless you eternally.

*Chapter 12. [Silver Hope] has been completed.

journal.title: Stories Told 1
journal.contents:
Talk to the Elf Elder in front of the Tree of Life.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → Elf Elder
journal.destination: Talk to the Elf Elder outside the Tree of Life

journal.title: Stories Told 2
journal.contents:
Citridel is eager to talk to you.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → Citridel

journal.title: Stories Told 3
journal.contents:
You have read all the words on the slate. Talk to Citridel.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → Citridel
journal.todo_msg: You read the slate. Talk to Citridel.

journal.title: Stories Told 4
journal.contents:
Update Geraint on the situation.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → Geraint
journal.destination: Talk to Geraint in Anu Arendel

journal.title: Stories Told 5
journal.contents:
Go to the place where Iona was standing and Collect your thoughts.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon) → Where Iona Was
journal.destination: Collect your thoughts at where Iona was

journal.title: Stories Told 6
journal.contents:
You've made up your mind. Inform the Elf Elder of your final decision.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → Elf Elder
journal.destination: Talk to the Elf Elder in Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: Tell the Elf Elder your final decision.
